title: Peanut Butter Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Can Peanut Butter Oreo live up to Peanut Butter Fudge Creme Oreo? We find out.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/gameovergreggy?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] [Applause] [Music] what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo oration I'm Greg Miller and while you are out living your life probably not going back to school like you should the fine people at or were making endless variations of milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like this video then subscribe to my Channel today we're reviewing peanut butter Oreos now this is a big deal ladies and gentlemen and if you remember way back uh the peanut butter fudge cream Oreos scored a 9.0 one of our highest reviews here on Oreo oration so we're excited to see if a regular Oreo can stand up to it of course every Oreo oration test review process here begins with nabisco's patented seal that's sometimes gives me a hard time like right now where we're going to see what the first look of the bag of cookies is there it is oh okay now I'm not excited about this look look you got some the first off

gives me a hard time like right now where we're going to see what the first look of the bag of cookies is there it is oh okay now I'm not excited about this look look you got some the first off the creams don't look clean you want clean creams when you open up of course right here you got a mashed up one you got a whole bunch of little dingleberries in there you got the black stuff all you don't want that you want to open up you want the cookies look good you want to go I want to eat that but I'll tell you right now I can tell you without even getting close the lovely bouquet of peanut butter coming off these cookies is just arousing if you like peanut butter and I know a few of you out there do cuz they keep making peanut butter things so on to part two the taste so we're going to crack one grab one here and see he's got the goo there let's see interesting see I thought it would be like the pure peanut butter taste but it's a very mild peanut butter I like that I enjoy that I enjoy

one grab one here and see he's got the goo there let's see interesting see I thought it would be like the pure peanut butter taste but it's a very mild peanut butter I like that I enjoy that I enjoy that it's not beating me over the head but in the same vein then I thought the you know the chocolate fudge cream peanut butter cookies we reviewed earlier I like that immediate reward of peanut butter this one I'm working a bit harder to I'm still getting through the chocolate cookie to get to them peanut butter I I enjoy it but how much do iJoy it I'll stew on that uh next of course milk pairing how does this Oreo pair with some milk get a good thing going there drop it down here we'll do our patented ther one two three no no not a fan of that the cookie itself not super crunchy Maybe that's you know maybe my three for wasn't as long we know the black cookie takes it really well but the peanut butter cream itself remember not real peanut butter it's the peanut butter cream it felt slimy

you know maybe my three for wasn't as long we know the black cookie takes it really well but the peanut butter cream itself remember not real peanut butter it's the peanut butter cream it felt slimy it didn't really break down it it didn't mesh well the cookies immediately separated from it and I was just like is there a miniature tongue in my mouth no it's the peanut butter cream which I'm not excited about some people might be not me we're going to go on to the twisting test crack it open here see how it twists ah an excellent twist if I do say myself let's see if we can get it another one for our best two out of three test what the hell this is a problem ladies and gentlemen with the different kinds of cremes they put in these Oreos nowadays they don't they don't stick to the cookie sometimes so now we got to go to three I don't even another this only a second time Oreo orations ever had to go to three there you go we stuck fine still one of the most disgusting things I think you

so now we got to go to three I don't even another this only a second time Oreo orations ever had to go to three there you go we stuck fine still one of the most disgusting things I think you can ever see when you're eating something is now not just a sliver of tongue a giant round tongue falls out of the cookie you were about to consume that can kind of gross you out and it kind of gross me out but they stuck together just fine I guess um so now we've gone through our four Oreo oration test where does it fall on the score oh man I am a peanut butter fan I'm not Bonkers for the peanut butter like many of you are uh I still don't think it's a great showing of peanut butter a slight peanut butter flavor to it but then all you know obviously we have the the tongue breaking down here it doesn't go well with the milk um the presentation was wasn't that great I'm going to go flat five 5.0 uh mediocre meh whatever you want to say it's right there on the cusp of being bad and then starting to

go well with the milk um the presentation was wasn't that great I'm going to go flat five 5.0 uh mediocre meh whatever you want to say it's right there on the cusp of being bad and then starting to be mediocre and starting to get into a better part but overall not that great of a thing and a giant departure from the 9.0 for that fudge cream but something about that fudge condom really locked in the peanut butter before that's the way to go if you're looking for a peanut butter Oreo that's the way the cookie crumbles for these peanut butter Oreos but what do you think I know you've probably tried these before leave your review as a video response below then like the video and subscribe to my channel now here's the big question are there other Oreos out there that I'm missing I'm sure there are leave those Oreos along with where you found them in the comments below then share this video with your friends I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but
